sen.j: 河上娘（かわかみのいらつめ、敏達天皇3年（575年）頃？－推古天皇25年（618年）頃？）は崇峻天皇の女御。
sen.e: Kawakami no iratsume (around 575 - around 618 [25 in the period of Emperor Suiko) is nyogo of Emperor Sushun.
KAWAKAMI no iratsume (around 575 - around 618) was a consort of the Emperor Sushun.
sen.cmt: 天皇年号を削除しました。nyogoの定訳を追加しました。時制を訂正しました。
sen.e: KAWAKAMI no iratsume (around 575 - around 618) was a consort of the Emperor Sushun.

sen.j: 飛鳥川の川上にいたので河上娘と呼ばれた。
sen.e: She was called Kawakami no iratsume because she was in the upriver of Asuka-gawa River.
She was called "KAWAKAMI no iratsume"(a girl of upriver) because she lived around the upper area of Asuka-gawa River.
sen.cmt: 文法整理のため、訂正しました。
sen.e: She was called "KAWAKAMI no iratsume"(a girl of upriver) because she lived around the upper area of Asuka-gawa River.

sen.j: 聖徳太子の妃で、山背大兄王らの生母である刀自古郎女と同一人物とされることもある。
sen.e: She is the wife of Prince Shotoku, and she is sometimes regarded as Tojiko no iratsume, the real mother of Prince Yamashiro no oe.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: She was a legitimate wife of Prince Shotoku; It is sometimes said that she was TOJIKO no iratsume who was the real mother of Prince Yamashiro no oe.
sen.cmt: 文法整理のため、訂正しました。
sen.e: She was a legitimate wife of Prince Shotoku; It is sometimes said that she was TOJIKO no iratsume who was the real mother of Prince Yamashiro no oe.

sen.j: 河上娘を刀自古郎女の姉とすることもあり、はっきりしない。
sen.e: However, Kawakami no iratsume is sometimes regarded as the elder sister of Tojiko no iratsume, and the truth is unknown.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: However, the truth is not certain as some people say KAWAKAMI no iratsume was an elder sister of TOJIKO no iratsume.
sen.cmt: 文法整理のため、訂正しました。
sen.e: However, the truth is not certain as some people say KAWAKAMI no iratsume was an elder sister of TOJIKO no iratsume.
